SELECT QUESTION_NO, QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_CONTENT,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - QUESTION_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - QUESTION_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - QUESTION_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - QUESTION_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - QUESTION_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - QUESTION_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(QUESTION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END QUESTION_DATE,
PROFILE_IMAGE, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM QUESTION LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE QUESTION_DEL_FL='N' AND CONTENT_ID=#{contentid} ORDER BY QUESTION_DATE
